x_revoked.description: The revoked property indicates whether the object has been revoked.
x_revoked.title: X Revoked

x_created.description: The created property represents the time at which the first version of this object was created. Must be precise to the nearest millisecond.
x_created.title: X Created

x_modified.description: The modified property represents the time that this particular version of the object was modified. Must be precise to the nearest millisecond.
x_modified.title: X Modified

description: This extension adds new properties to Software SCOs to capture full CPE information.
title: software-cpe-properties

cpe_version.description: The version of the CPE definition. The latest CPE definition version is 2.3.
cpe_version.title: Cpe Version

part.description: May have 1 of 3 values: `a` for Applications, `h` for Hardware, `o` for Operating Systems
part.title: Part

vendor.description: Values for this attribute SHOULD describe or identify the person or organization that manufactured or created the product.
vendor.title: Vendor

product.description: The name of the system/package/component. `product` and `vendor` are sometimes identical. It can not contain spaces, slashes, or most special characters.
product.title: Product

version.description: Vendor-specific alphanumeric string characterizing the particular release version of the product.
version.title: Version

update.description: Vendor-specific alphanumeric strings characterizing the particular update, service pack, or point release of the product.
update.title: Update

edition.description: A further granularity describing the build of the system/package/component, beyond `version`.
edition.title: Edition

language.description: A valid language tag as defined by IETF RFC 4646 entitled Tags for Identifying Languages.
language.title: Language

sw_edition.description: How the product is tailored to a particular market or class of end users.
sw_edition.title: Sw Edition

target_sw.description: Software computing environment within which the product operates.
target_sw.title: Target Sw

target_hw.description: Instruction set architecture (e.g., x86) on which the product operates.
target_hw.title: Target Hw

other.description: Any other general descriptive or identifying information which is vendor- or product-specific and which does not logically fit anywhere else.
other.title: Other
